description: Fluffy herbed ricotta-stuffed jacket potatoes topped with crunchy capsicum and cucumber. Make these in three steps for an easy dinner.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mar 2022,Peanut free
name: Herbed Ricotta-Stuffed Jacket Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids lunch & dinner,Side dishes,Fresh Food Kids
recipeIngredient: 1 small red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fan-forced. Pierce potatoes all over with a fork, then wrap each in foil. Place on top oven rack and bake for 50 minutes or until tender. Allow to cool for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine ricotta and chives in a medium bowl. Season with pepper.

Carefully remove potatoes from foil and place on serving plates. Cut potatoes down middle, ensuring not to cut all the way through. Gently pull apart potatoes to create an opening. Fill cavities with ricotta mixture, then top with capsicum and cucumber. Divide rocket among plates and serve.
